page.text: The champion has the most disbelieving look on her face as she realizes she's looking up at you. That last blow must of dazed her a moment cause now she's finding herself sprawled at your feet and seeing your confident smile "I..I lost? but..I can't lose.."

choice.text: $Yes, you lost..and of course..you know what happens to losers...

page.text:
The elf catches on quickly as you stride over and grab her roughly by the hair, your parted thighs standing astride her
,the way you've already shucked your clothes aside and the smirk on your face all get your meaning across clearly "NO! choice.text: What goes around comes around, especially if what goes around is anal vore

page.text: Your musings seem under appreciated by the greenskinned woman sliding steadily between your rump cheeks. page.text: Her muffled noises emanate from deep inside of you now as you tug her completely into your ass. Her feet twitching around furiously as they're confined and then vanish between your rumpcheeks as you straighten up. The champion puts up a satisfying struggle, but gradually her protests and squirms are subsumed and fade away into the increasingly liquid glorps and gurgles of your belly. The elven champion was one of their greatest warriors, now she's not even your greatest meal. Your gut turning smooth and round as succumbs utterly to her fate as your food. A few burbles audible as her remnants compact and start to filter back the way they'd come, the elf soaked up utterly as she traces her way back through your innards until not a trace of her remains unabsorbed. Victory is yours.
You have devoured your prey in some unspecified, unelaborated on yet satisfying way.
